data.heading: Web development
data.text: All the things that comes with web development: Javascript, React, Typescript, NextJs, Jest, Responsive design, CSS, Styled Components

data.heading: Cloud
data.text: I've being working with AWS for almost two years and have good understanding of the different services that are provided and how they can be used when it comes to web development

data.heading: Design
data.text: Like the looks of my page? I designed the entire page on my own. I enjoy doing UX and thinks userbility is a huge part of the development process.

data.heading: The things around Web
data.text: Being a web developer includes a lot of other stuff. I have experience in developing microservices, Google Analytics, SEO
